articles.author: StudyFinds Analysis
articles.title: Nearly Two-Thirds Of Young Americans Have Considered Leaving The Country - StudyFinds
articles.description: 63% of young Americans have considered leaving the U.S. AI anxiety also doubled among students, and half of adults report feeling lonely.
articles.content:
The stress and loneliness of an increasingly divided society has left many Americans wondering if the grass is greener elsewhere. (Credit: Kosoff on Shutterstock)
